/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/SimpleNGL.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SimpleNGL.dir/src/NGLScene.cpp.o CMakeFiles/SimpleNGL.dir/SimpleNGL_automoc.cpp.o  -o SimpleNGL  -L/home/yioannidis/NGL/lib  -lNGL -lGL /opt/qt/5.5/gcc_64/lib/libQt5OpenGL.so.5.5.0 /opt/qt/5.5/gcc_64/lib/libQt5Widgets.so.5.5.0 /opt/qt/5.5/gcc_64/lib/libQt5Gui.so.5.5.0 /opt/qt/5.5/gcc_64/lib/libQt5Core.so.5.5.0 -Wl,-rpath,/home/yioannidis/NGL/lib:/opt/qt/5.5/gcc_64/lib
